text: The travel insurance provides benefits such as overseas hospitalization allowance, follow-up medical expenses in Singapore, and emergency medical evacuation and repatriation, but has limitations including non-coverage for travel to areas with government-issued travel advisories and failure to obtain recommended vaccines. There are no named product brands mentioned in the document fragment. The insurance has specific conditions and exclusions that apply to each section, including general exclusions and specific limitations on medical expenses and evacuations.
